text: Irving M. Stern (born November 6, 1928) is an American politician in the state of Minnesota. He served in the Minnesota Senate from 1979 to 1982 as a Minnesota Democratic–Farmer–Labor Party member, representing district 41. Stern previously served as mayor of St. Louis Park, Minnesota from 1977 to 1979. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Milwaukee Category:People from St. Louis Park, Minnesota Category:Roosevelt University alumni Category:Businesspeople from Minnesota Category:Minnesota Democrats Category:Members of the Minnesota House of Representatives
title: Irving Stern
